description:
Create Navigation Flow System

Design and implement a complete navigation system that allows users to move between different sections or pages of the application.

Requirements:
- Define all primary navigation routes and their hierarchy
- Implement a navigation component (navbar, sidebar, or menu) with links to key sections
- Ensure proper routing configuration with URL path management
- Add visual indicators for the current active page/section
- Handle navigation state (history, back/forward functionality)
- Implement breadcrumbs or path indicators for nested navigation if applicable
- Ensure navigation is accessible (keyboard navigation, screen reader support)
- Handle edge cases: invalid routes (404), protected routes, redirects
- Test navigation flow across all defined routes
- Ensure consistent navigation behavior across the application
